Class CLISmartHandler

java.lang.Object
  java.util.logging.Handler
      de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.logging.CLISmartHandler

public class CLISmartHandler
extends Handler

Handler that handles output to the console with clever formatting.

Author:
Erich Schubert
